column5: I'm  going to be in the market for an out board motor  soon, Im likely to buy used but considering new. I've heard lots about Beter deals to be had across the border and since the Canadian dollar is strong I think it will be worth looking into. So I was wondering if anyone can recommend any dealers over the river. I'm not really stuck on one brand but leaning towards Yamaha and evinrude

If your looking for refurbished units,lower horses. Theres a guy in beamsvile by the name of hans. I picked up my kicker 7.5 honda 4 stroke from him. if hes still around, he was advertising. Try grimsby bait and tackle, they may know.
Clayton NY http://www.claytonmarina.com/  I've never done business with them but the prices are pretty good.
